by.horant.fintask.dao.impl

Class SQLUpdateUserDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.horant.fintask.dao.impl.SQLUpdateUserDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpdateUserDao

    public class SQLUpdateUserDao
extends java.lang.Object
implements UpdateUserDao
    This class is an implementation of the UpdateUserDao interface and provides the functionality of updating user data in the MySQL database. This includes updating your password, email, and personal information (for example, first and last name).
    Author:
    Anton Horbach

      • updateProfile

        public boolean updateProfile(java.lang.String email,
                             UpdateProfileData updateData)
                      throws DaoException
        Updates user profile(first and second name).
        Specified by:
        updateProfile in interface UpdateUserDao
        Parameters:
        email - email user whose data we want to update.
        updateData - an object of class UpdateProfileData which encapsulates the necessary data for updating.
        Returns:
        true - if the update was successful, false - if the update wasn't successful.
        Throws:
        DaoException
